_header: In Bethlehem this bird of life
_description: A Christmas carol — five 6-line stanzas (aaabab) and burden: ‘Nowel nowel nowel / To vs is born owr god emanuel’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
In bedlem þat child of lyfe ys born of mary maydd &
                    wyfe…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…Thus telleth vs the prophecyysHere be forne as they dyde
                    tell

CamTCC1230.First Lines:
In bedlem þis berde of lyfIs born or uirgyne maydyn and
                    wyf…
CamTCC1230.Last Lines:
…The ferst tydyng of þis testamentbrowth to vs seynt
                    gabryel
